item.title: Monique add a quote by Bessie Anderson Stanley
Monique add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Monique add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Monique add a quote by Bob Marley
item.description: "One good thing about music, when it hits you, you feel no pain." -- Bob Marley
